attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I thinks it's time Gordon Brown handed over to someone who listens to his people. We are sick and tired of being taxed upon taxed.This country leaves nothing nothing to be proud of anymore, even our own goverment are ripping off the workers of this country. And to add insult to injury they are even using public money to fund their private lives by paying members of their familiy or ordering garden plants!!!! When is the Prime Minister going to make its MP's more accountable for their actions. Even the most simple of soultions can not be dealt with by our Prime Minister,What chance does this county have with this sort of weak leadership.

LETS JOIN TOGETHER AND LET HIM KNOW WE WE WANT GORDON OUT.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
